CustomField.description: Select Type against "Object Field" should be validated. "Value" compares "Object Field" with static value provided in "Target Value". "Field" compares "Object Field" with "Target Field" of same record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select Type against "Object Field" should be validated. "Value" compares "Object Field" with static value provided in "Target Value". "Field" compares "Object Field" with "Target Field" of same record.
CustomField.label: Target Type
